statements: SELECT * FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_target FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT salesperson_id, customer_interactions FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT * FROM sales_team_performance ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_target FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_target > 50000;
SELECT * FROM sales_team_performance WHERE salesperson_id = 1
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_target FROM sales_team_performance ORDER BY sales_target DESC
SELECT AVG(commission_rate) AS avg_commission_rate FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_target > 50000
SELECT salesperson_name, commission_rate, customer_interactions FROM sales_team_performance WHERE salesperson_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM sales_team_performance WHERE customer_interactions IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM sales_targets;
SELECT salesperson_id, target_amount FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM sales_commissions ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT salesperson_id, commission_amount FROM sales_commissions WHERE commission_amount < 500;
SELECT salesperson_id, target_month FROM sales_targets WHERE target_month BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
SELECT salesperson_id, target_amount, target_month FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount > 5000 ORDER BY target_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_commissions WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT salesperson_id, commission_amount, sale_date FROM sales_commissions WHERE commission_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT salesperson_id, commission_amount, sale_date FROM sales_commissions WHERE commission_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY salesperson_id
SELECT * FROM sales_targets INNER JOIN sales_commissions ON sales_targets.salesperson_id = sales_commissions.salesperson_id WHERE target_amount < 7000 ORDER BY salesperson_id ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_targets;
SELECT salesperson_id, achieved_amount FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount > 5000;
SELECT salesperson_id, total_commission FROM commissions WHERE commission_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY total_commission DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE salesperson_id = 1001 AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date;
SELECT salesperson_id, target_amount, achieved_amount FROM sales_targets WHERE achieved_amount < target_amount;
SELECT salesperson_id, target_amount, achieved_amount FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount > 5000 ORDER BY achieved_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM commissions WHERE total_commission >= 2000 ORDER BY commission_rate ASC, salesperson_id DESC;
SELECT salesperson_id, SUM(total_commission) AS total_earnings FROM commissions GROUP BY salesperson_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_earnings DESC;

SELECT s.salesperson_id, s.target_amount, c.total_commission FROM sales_targets s INNER JOIN commissions c ON s.salesperson_id = c.salesperson_id ORDER BY c.total_commission DESC, s.target_amount ASC;
SELECT c.salesperson_id, c.commission_rate, c.total_commission, s.target_amount FROM commissions c LEFT JOIN sales_targets s ON c.salesperson_id = s.salesperson_id WHERE s.target_amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM sales_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT target_amount, due_date FROM sales_targets WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_commissions WHERE commission_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM sales_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM sales_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(target_amount) FROM sales_targets WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, commission_rate FROM sales_teams JOIN sales_targets ON sales_teams.team_id = sales_targets.team_id JOIN sales_commissions ON sales_targets.target_id = sales_commissions.target_id;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS interactions_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY team_id HAVING interactions_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM SalesTeam;
SELECT sales_name, sales_target FROM SalesTeam WHERE sales_target > 5000;
SELECT sales_name, team_id FROM SalesTeam ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Commissions WHERE commission_amount != 0;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sales_name, sales_target FROM SalesTeam;
SELECT * FROM Commissions WHERE commission_rate > 0.05;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_manager FROM Teams ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email AS email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone IS NULL;
SELECT interaction_id, sales_id, customer_id FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
